vehicles.rule: No vehicles in the town square.

goals.text: A small town is concerned that air pollution is becoming a problem in their town square.
goals.continuation: Because of this, the local government passed a new rule:

goals.text: A small town is concerned that there is too much ambient noise in their town square.
goals.continuation: Because of this, the local government passed a new rule:

goals.text: A small town is concerned for the safety of pedestrians in their town square.
goals.continuation: Because of this, the local government passed a new rule:
The local government of a small town has passed a new rule for their town square:

goals.text: A local bookstore is concerned for patrons that have airborne allergies.
goals.continuation: Because of this, the owners have posted a new rule:

goals.text: A local bookstore is concerned that there is too much ambient noise inside the store.
goals.continuation: Because of this, the owners have posted a new rule:

goals.text: A local bookstore is concerned that the store is unsafe for patrons.
